homeHeader.title: Plan, Launch, & Scale Your Media Venture in Ajman Media City Free Zone within 24 Hours
homeHeader.description: Struggling with incomplete documentation, visa allocation limits, or licensing rejections? At One Nexuz, expert consultants help you navigate the setup process, empowering you to secure your license, visa, and office within days, not weeks. Get instant access to Ajman’s business-friendly landscape, world-class production facilities, and flexible licensing options to launch and expand your creative or media business.

leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify Ajman Media City Free Zone Company Formation

items.title: Select Your Business Activity
items.description: We’ll start by assessing your service or products to match you with the appropriate business activity and legal entity.

items.title: Prepare Your Documentation
items.description: Next, our expert consultants will help you collect and file the necessary documents, including your passport and trade name.

items.title: Submit Your Application
items.description: We’ll then assist you in preparing the registration documents and obtaining an establishment card for a seamless setup journey.

items.title: Collect Your License & ID
items.description: Our seasoned advisors will assist you in undergoing a medical checkup and filing for an entry permit, followed by the collection of your license and Emirates ID.

items.title: Get Post-Licensing Support
items.description: We’ll continue to support you long after you receive your license, including setting up a corporate bank account, managing payroll, and more!

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Why should I set up in Ajman Media City Free Zone?
items.answer: Ajman Media City FZ is a fantastic option for creative, digital, and publishing companies seeking flexible and cost-efficient setup solutions. Additionally, the region offers strategic market access to the West, Gulf, and Asia.

items.question: Do I have to pay taxes in Ajman Media City Free Zone?
items.answer: No! Businesses in AMC FZ can save millions on corporate, capital gains, and import-export taxes.

items.question: What are the different business activities available in Ajman Media City FZ?
items.answer: Ajman Media City Free Zone allows you to choose from a single shareholder, multiple owners, a branch of a foreign company, a branch of a UAE company, and a subsidiary of a foreign company.

items.question: What are the company formation options allowed in Ajman Media City FZ?
items.answer: Ajman Media City Free Zone allows you to choose from a single shareholder, multiple owners, a branch of a foreign company, a branch of a UAE company, and a subsidiary of a foreign company.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me set up a corporate bank account in Ajman Free Zone?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our expert consultants connect you with the ideal bank partner to simplify personal and business finances.
